flounder.sounds

Class Playlist

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.sounds.Playlist

  • public class Playlist
extends java.lang.Object
    A playlist of music tracks that can be played on the MusicPlayer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Playlist()
      Creates a new playlist of music tracks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMusic(Sound music)
      Add a music track to the playlist.
      void clear()
      Clear all tracks from the playlist.
      java.util.List<Sound> getOrderedTracks() 
      java.util.List<Sound> getShuffledMusicList(Sound previouslyPlayed)
      Returns a list of the tracks in a random order.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Playlist

        public Playlist()
        Creates a new playlist of music tracks.

    • Method Detail

      • addMusic

        public void addMusic(Sound music)
        Add a music track to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        music - The track to be added.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear all tracks from the playlist.

      • getOrderedTracks

        public java.util.List<Sound> getOrderedTracks()
        Returns:
        The list of playlist trakcs in their current order.

      • getShuffledMusicList

        public java.util.List<Sound> getShuffledMusicList(Sound previouslyPlayed)
        Returns a list of the tracks in a random order. It ensures that the first track in the list is not the same as the track specified as being previously played (to avoid a track being repeated twice in a row).
        Parameters:
        previouslyPlayed - The last track to be played.
        Returns:
        The list of tracks in a random order.
